EmailConfig.SelecionaRegistros: SELECT MAX(TPACTAR.IDEPACTAR) IDEPACTAR FROM TLICAMB INNER JOIN TPLAACO ON TLICAMB.IDEPLAACOPRGAMB = TPLAACO.IDEPLAACO INNER JOIN TPACTAR ON TPACTAR.IDEPLAACO = TPLAACO.IDEPLAACO WHERE TPACTAR.FIMREA IS NULL AND (TPACTAR.IDEUSURES IS NOT NULL OR TPACTAR.EMLUSURES IS NOT NULL) AND TPACTAR.DEL = 0 AND ((TPACTAR.FREREC = 0 AND (GETDATE() + 7) >= CASE WHEN TPACTAR.INIREA IS NULL THEN Coalesce(TPACTAR.INIPRE, TPACTAR.FIMPRE) ELSE TPACTAR.FIMPRE END) OR (TPACTAR.FREREC <> 0 AND (GETDATE() + 7) >= Coalesce(TPACTAR.PRXEXCREC, TPACTAR.INIPRE))) GROUP BY TPACTAR.IDEUSURES, TPACTAR.EMLUSURES
EmailConfig.SelecionaDestinatarios: SELECT CASE WHEN TPACTAR.IDEUSURES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TUSU.IDEUSU END IDEUSU, CASE WHEN TPACTAR.NMEUSURES IS NULL THEN TUSU.NME ELSE TPACTAR.NMEUSURES END NME, CASE WHEN TPACTAR.EMLUSURES IS NULL THEN TUSU.EML ELSE TPACTAR.EMLUSURES END EML FROM TUSU RIGHT JOIN TPACTAR ON TUSU.IDEUSU = TPACTAR.IDEUSURES WHERE TPACTAR.IDEPACTAR = [IDEPACTAR] UNION SELECT TPACTAR.IDEUSUELB IDEUSU, TUSU.NME NME, TUSU.EML EML FROM TPACTAR INNER JOIN TUSU ON TUSU.IDEUSU = TPACTAR.IDEUSUELB WHERE TPACTAR.IDEPACTAR = [IDEPACTAR]

Tabelas.SelecionaTabelas: SELECT CASE DBO.DEFINIRSTATUSACAO(TPACTAR.IDEPACTAR, GETDATE()) WHEN 1 THEN 'Planejada' WHEN 2 THEN 'Em Execução' WHEN 3 THEN 'Atrasada' END STT, TEPRLICAMB.NME NMEPRJ, VUNI.SIG SIGUNI, ('(' + TTIPLICAMB.SIG +') ' + TLICAMB.CODINT) LIC, TLICAMB.NUMPCS, TPACTAR.WHT, DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, CASE WHEN TPACTAR.FREREC = 0 THEN CASE WHEN TPACTAR.INIREA IS NULL THEN Coalesce(TPACTAR.INIPRE, TPACTAR.FIMPRE) ELSE TPACTAR.FIMPRE END ELSE Coalesce(TPACTAR.PRXEXCREC, TPACTAR.INIPRE) END), 0) DATPEN, TPACTAR.IDEPACTAR FROM TLICAMB INNER JOIN TPLAACO ON TLICAMB.IDEPLAACOPRGAMB = TPLAACO.IDEPLAACO INNER JOIN TPACTAR ON TPACTAR.IDEPLAACO = TPLAACO.IDEPLAACO INNER JOIN TEPRLICAMB ON TLICAMB.IDEEPRLICAMB = TEPRLICAMB.IDEEPRLICAMB INNER JOIN TTIPLICREGAMB ON TEPRLICAMB.IDETIPLICREGAMB = TTIPLICREGAMB.IDETIPLICREGAMB INNER JOIN VUNI ON VUNI.IDEUNI = TEPRLICAMB.IDEUNI INNER JOIN TTIPLICAMB ON TTIPLICAMB.IDETIPLICAMB = TLICAMB.IDETIPLICAMB WHERE TPACTAR.FIMREA IS NULL AND TPACTAR.DEL = 0 AND (TPACTAR.IDEUSURES = (SELECT IDEUSURES FROM TPACTAR WHERE IDEPACTAR = [IDEPACTAR]) OR (TPACTAR.EMLUSURES = (SELECT EMLUSURES FROM TPACTAR WHERE IDEPACTAR = [IDEPACTAR])) AND TPACTAR.IDEUSURES IS NULL) AND ((TPACTAR.FREREC = 0 AND (GETDATE() + 7) >= CASE WHEN TPACTAR.INIREA IS NULL THEN Coalesce(TPACTAR.INIPRE, TPACTAR.FIMPRE) ELSE TPACTAR.FIMPRE END) OR (TPACTAR.FREREC <> 0 AND (GETDATE() + 7) >= Coalesce(TPACTAR.PRXEXCREC, TPACTAR.INIPRE))) ORDER BY DATPEN
